hadiths.text: On the authority of Jundub ibn Abdullah (may Allah be pleased with him), who said that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: There was amongst those before you a man who had a wound. He was in [such] anguish that he took a knife and made with it a cut in his hand, and the blood did not cease to flow till he died. Allah the Almighty said: My servant has himself forestalled Me; I have forbidden him Paradise. It was related by al-Bukhari
